intro.text:
Hey there! I'm Paulo Hecht and I'm here to save princess Naty..
She's waiting for me at the end of the level...
As you may have noticed, this is an HTML5 open source project I've been working on. In the near future, I intend to start a blog to write down more details about it...

For instance, take a look at the GitHub page, there may be something there already... at least credits to all the guys that made it possible without even knowing it... gosh I hope I remember them all!
It's a basic platformer, I may write down things I still want to develop in GitHub, like Camera movement, Parallax, and, why not, some goombas, and...
HECHT! STOP NERDING ABOUT THIS STUPID PROJECT AND COME SAVE ME!

Errrr... Got to go now... hope you got the point... just use arrow keys and that's all...
I'M GOING AFTER YOU PRINCESS!!!
